title: Zachari & Alati
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Mediterranean, Fast food, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Greek
description: A fast food/street food vegetarian restaurant with plenty of vegan options. A really friendly place in the center of Athens, close to Acropolis metro station. Offers pita bread wraps with falafel or mung bean burgers that are baked in the oven. Also, traditional vegan pies and salads. Many gluten-free options too. Traditional refreshments (lemonade, cinnamonade, tzintzer drink) and coffees/teas/juices (plant milk available).
